title: AnyReader 3.16 Build 1130 + Patch
description:
An intuitive application that allows users to recover data from damaged CD's, DVD's, HD DVD's, Blu-Ray's or disks with problems and copy data from remote PC's wehen ther network connection is unstable.



AnyReader is a very useful and lightweight application designed to help you discover data from scratched CD's and DVD's, detective floppy disks or other type of disks.



It boasts a clean and straightforward interface that offers step-by-step assistance throughout the recovery operation, so even less experienced users can master the entire process with minimum effort.



AnyReader gives you the possibility to copy files from disks with problems, such as bad sectors, phisical damage by selecting the items, specifying the saving directory and making the program preserve the original folder structure.



What's more, you can configure the copying settings in terms of number of attempts to read bad sectors, pause between retrying attempts and skipped sector value.



At the end of the task, the tool offers details about the files, such as name, sizxe, bad sectors, status (finished, waiting) and recoverability percentage. Plus the app generates HTML reports which include information about the recovery process.



AnyReader is able to read data from damaged CD's, DVD's, HD DVD's or Blu-Ray's, rip audio CD's as well as create ISO images of the selected disks.



Other important features worth mentioning are represented by the possibility to copy files from a remote PC when the network connection is unstable (useful for Wi-Fi Networks) and merge two damaged files into a single file.



During my testing I have noticed that AnyReader carries out a task quickly and whitout errors throughout the entire process. It manages to remain light on the system resources, so it doesn't burden the overall performance of computer, not interfere with other programs functionality.



So sum things up, AnyReader offers an intuitive environment for helping you recover data from different disks with ease.



Changelog (updated version released on 29-02-2016):

- Removed unnecesary files from installation
- Fixed critical bug with parameters saving
- Fixed critical bug wityh copying of files with invalid date
- Fixed access error to an deleted object during copying
